Refer Circular dt. 25.06.2019 of GM (SRD&Q) circulating RFP documents for Consultancy Assignments of IE/ AE and DPR issued by MoRTH: 2 The following amendments to the Data Sheet of above RFP documents are being issued to adopt the evaluation criteria for QCBS as 80:20. (i) The weightage given to Technical Proposal 80% .
